reviews.review_msg: He gives good feedback, makes everything clear and easy.
He is too sensitive and not open minded.

I love his voice, really soft and help you remember material immediately. Maybe because he teaches psychology, he knows how to help students study with minimum effort but gain great result. The way he teaches helps students not to feel stressful at all. You can meet him at office hour and ask for his advice to arrange schedule and reduce stress
His voice is kinda monotonous but you may be interested in the course material, which is fascinating. Ask Owen on how to write a clear essay and he will help you. Be sure to listen to his lecture
